H0.text: Prevents mutation is an advantage of sexual reproduction for the survival of a population.

H1.text: Maintains genetic diversity is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

H2.text: Reducing the number of genes is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

H3.text: Creates competition between siblings is an advantage of sexual reproduction in the survival of a population.

A5.text: Sexual reproduction impedes the accumulation of harmful genetic mutations
